identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

primary.description: Deep Midnight Navy - The 'Black Car' Authority

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-sm font-bold tracking-wide uppercase text-sm transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-12 px-8 rounded-sm font-medium
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white h-12 px-8 rounded-sm font-bold uppercase tracking-wide transition-all

cards.feature: bg-white border border-border p-8 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden
cards.vehicle: bg-zinc-50 border-none p-0 overflow-hidden group hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-500

inputs.default: h-12 bg-white border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-sm transition-all

hero_background.description: Moody city street with luxury car vibe

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px, sharp edges where possible

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4, ease: 'easeOut' }}
motion.stagger_children: variants={{ hidden: { opacity: 0 }, show: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }}

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text

instructions_to_main_agent: Use .js or .jsx extension for new files as per project constraints.
Do NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Chivo'.
Implement the 'Booking Engine' as a high-priority, visible element on the Home Hero.
Use the 'Tetris Grid' for the Fleet page to avoid boring equal-height cards.
Ensure the Admin Dashboard uses the 'Bento Grid' for high data density.
Do not use generic gradients. Use the defined 'hero_overlay' or solid colors.
For the 'Executive' feel, use plenty of negative space (p-12+) in marketing sections.

do_not: Use purple or teal for primary actions
Use default Tailwind shadows (use custom defined above)
must_do: Implement 'lenis' for smooth scrolling if possible
